content:
Is there a graceful way to get all crates that are passed to the linker by rustc (in Miri)?
I'm trying to implement miri#1170. I have tried TyCtxt::crates() and TyCtxt::dependency_formats(), but the former sometimes reports both panic_unwind and panic_abort (which are not compatible), and the later causes "crate ... required to be available in rlib format, but was not found in this form" errors (because only rmeta files are available).
